HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Additions: - Ancient dangers are a bit more interesting Fixes: - Trader kinds for FB factions are merged together, so that they can all fit on the faction negotiation dialog Tweaks: - Added a bunch more biomes to the "Is pack animal allowed?" patch; re-adjusted temperatures

Additions: - Mixed race starting colonists now work for Lost Tribes scenario - Added config option to blacklist specific races ("Excluded pawn kinds by race") - Added Chinese translations. (Thanks, CaptainSnafu!) Fixes: - Different racial backstories no longer get mixed together. The same goes for hair styles. - Xenomorphs and Better Infestation's Queens are in the blacklist by default - Blacklist config options now use a larger textbox Tweaks: - Badly-behaving pawns (ones that attack their own faction) will get a debug warning that will include the defaultFactionType and race defName to use in one of the blacklists - Blacklist filter displays will update their cache properly while entries are being changed - Blacklist config options will detect defaults based on the previous mod version and upgrade them
Additions: - Now you can use all your races for vanilla starting scenarios! - Added all races for wanderer, refugee, and slave types as well - All of these options are adjustable in Mod Settings

Additions: - Added a config menu. Now you can tweak which pawns are included in various groups. - Replaced the caravan pack animal generation algorithm. Now, trade caravan pack animals will vary in count based on the wares weight, will sometimes show up with a variety of pack animals, and will try to balance the cargo's weight without overloading themselves (usually). Fixes: - The new Archotech Centipede from Genetic Rim is no longer a threat. Unless you want to re-adjust the slider... Tweaks: - A few more variations on faction names - The herdAnimal property is no longer a factor in determining if they are appropriate in combat - Since the pack animal algorithm has been replaced, body size is no longer a factor in determining appropriate caravan pack animals
